text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: ma 'adri ahdha aleadhab aldhy wuedtm bih qarib zmnh, 'am yajeal lah rabiy mdt twyl? wahu subhanah ealam bima ghab ean alabsar, fala yuzhir ealaa ghaybih ahdana min khlqh, 'iilaa man aikhtarah allah lrsalth wartdah, fa'iinah yutlehm ealaa bed alghyb, wayursil min 'amam alrasul wamin khalfih malayikat yahfazunah min aljn; lialaa ystrqwh wyhmsu bih 'iilaa alkhnt; liaelam alrasul salaa allah ealayh wslm, 'ana alrusul qablih kanuu ealaa mthl halh min altabligh bialhaqi walsdq, wa'anah hufz kama hufzu min aljn, wa'ana allah subhanah 'ahat ealamah bima eindahum zahrana wbatnana min alshraye walahkam wghyrha, la yfwth minha shy', wa'anah taealaa ahsa kula shay' eddana, falam yakhf ealayh minh shy'
